text: Robert William Kastenmeier (January 24, 1924 â€“ March 20, 2015) was an American politician. He represented Wisconsin in the United States House of Representatives from 1959 to 1991. He was a member of the Democratic Party.'Wisconsin Blue Book 1989-1990,' Biographical Sketch of Robert W.
